Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Wellington
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell; SB: Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Wellington

Northbound buses will operate via California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell

Southbound buses will operate via Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski due to debris on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski due to debris on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between The Elevated Loop and Pulaski at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Pulaski and 54th/Cermak to provide connecting service.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
